faqs.free_a: Yes, it is free for everyone to use.
faqs.accessible_q: Can I use it in restricted countries?
faqs.accessible_a: Yes, but you need to use it legally. Do not use it for illegal purposes.
faqs.privacy_a: Yes, we do not store any data, cookies, analytics, or trackers.
faqs.gpt_a: GPT is a language model developed by OpenAI. It is one of the most advanced language models to date.
faqs.sunsun_chat_q: What sets sunsun-Chat apart from other chatbots?
faqs.sunsun_chat_a: sunsun-Chat is developed based on the GPT model and optimized for network performance, providing faster access and multi-platform support.

main.title: sunsun-Chat
main.subtitle: A chatbot based on GPT
main.about_content: sunsun-Chat is an AI chat assistant, chatGPT out of the box, no account and proxy required.
